thread.title: Iraq Says U.S. Strike Killed Local Security Forces by Mistake

author: Ghassan Adnan
title: Iraq Says U.S. Strike Killed Local Security Forces by Mistake

organizations.name: u.s. strike killed local security forces

text:
A U.S.-led coalition airstrike in support of an Iraqi military raid early Saturday mistakenly killed several members of the country’s security forces, Iraqi officials said, in an incident seized upon by Iraqi factions that oppose the international coalition’s continued presence after victory was declared over Islamic State.
Ryan Dillon, a spokesman for the U.S.-led coalition, said it had provided support for the raid in the town of Baghdadi, but wouldn’t confirm whether it had carried out any airstrikes in the vicinity until...
